trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Engagement iOS SDK Upgrade Procedure
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Engagement iOS SDK Upgrade Procedure

trans-unit.source: Latest updates and procedures for iOS SDK for Azure Mobile Engagement
trans-unit.target: Latest updates and procedures for iOS SDK for Azure Mobile Engagement

trans-unit.source: Upgrade procedures
trans-unit.target: Upgrade procedures

trans-unit.source: If you already have integrated an older version of Engagement into your application, you have to consider the following points when upgrading the SDK.
trans-unit.target: If you already have integrated an older version of Engagement into your application, you have to consider the following points when upgrading the SDK.

trans-unit.source: For each new version of the SDK you must first replace (remove and re-import in xcode) the EngagementSDK and EngagementReach folders.
trans-unit.target: For each new version of the SDK you must first replace (remove and re-import in xcode) the EngagementSDK and EngagementReach folders.

trans-unit.source: Dropped support for iOS 4.X.
trans-unit.target: Dropped support for iOS 4.X.

trans-unit.source: Starting from this version the deployment target of your application must be at least iOS 6.
trans-unit.target: Starting from this version the deployment target of your application must be at least iOS 6.

trans-unit.source: If you are using Reach in your application, you must add remote-notification value to the UIBackgroundModes array in your Info.plist file in order to receive remote notifications.
trans-unit.target: If you are using Reach in your application, you must add remote-notification value to the UIBackgroundModes array in your Info.plist file in order to receive remote notifications.

trans-unit.source: The method application:didReceiveRemoteNotification: needs to be replaced by application:didReceiveRemoteNotification:fetchCompletionHandler: in your application delegate.
trans-unit.target: The method application:didReceiveRemoteNotification: needs to be replaced by application:didReceiveRemoteNotification:fetchCompletionHandler: in your application delegate.

trans-unit.source: "AEPushDelegate.h" is deprecated interface and you need to remove all references.
trans-unit.target: "AEPushDelegate.h" is deprecated interface and you need to remove all references.

trans-unit.source: This includes removing [[EngagementAgent shared] setPushDelegate:self] and the delegate methods from your application delegate:
trans-unit.target: This includes removing [[EngagementAgent shared] setPushDelegate:self] and the delegate methods from your application delegate:

trans-unit.source: The following describes how to migrate an SDK integration from the Capptain service offered by Capptain SAS into an app powered by Azure Mobile Engagement.
trans-unit.target: The following describes how to migrate an SDK integration from the Capptain service offered by Capptain SAS into an app powered by Azure Mobile Engagement.

trans-unit.source: If you are migrating from an earlier version, please consult the Capptain web site to migrate to 1.16 first then apply the following procedure.
trans-unit.target: If you are migrating from an earlier version, please consult the Capptain web site to migrate to 1.16 first then apply the following procedure.

trans-unit.source: [Azure.IMPORTANT] Capptain and Mobile Engagement are not the same services and the procedure given below only highlights how to migrate the client app.
trans-unit.target: [Azure.IMPORTANT] Capptain and Mobile Engagement are not the same services and the procedure given below only highlights how to migrate the client app.

trans-unit.source: Migrating the SDK in the app will NOT migrate your data from the Capptain servers to the Mobile Engagement servers
trans-unit.target: Migrating the SDK in the app will NOT migrate your data from the Capptain servers to the Mobile Engagement servers

trans-unit.source: Agent
trans-unit.target: Agent

trans-unit.source: The method registerApp: has been replaced by the new method init:.
trans-unit.target: The method registerApp: has been replaced by the new method init:.

trans-unit.source: Your application delegate must be updated accordingly and use connection string:
trans-unit.target: Your application delegate must be updated accordingly and use connection string:

trans-unit.source: SmartAd tracking has been removed from SDK you just have to remove all instances of AETrackModule class
trans-unit.target: SmartAd tracking has been removed from SDK you just have to remove all instances of AETrackModule class

trans-unit.source: Class Name Changes
trans-unit.target: Class Name Changes

trans-unit.source: As part of the rebranding, there are couple of class/file names that need to be changed.
trans-unit.target: As part of the rebranding, there are couple of class/file names that need to be changed.

trans-unit.source: All classes prefixed with "CP" are renamed with "AE" prefix.
trans-unit.target: All classes prefixed with "CP" are renamed with "AE" prefix.

trans-unit.source: Example:
trans-unit.target: Example:

trans-unit.source: CPModule.h is renamed to AEModule.h.
trans-unit.target: CPModule.h is renamed to AEModule.h.

trans-unit.source: All classes prefixed with "Capptain" are renamed with "Engagement" prefix.
trans-unit.target: All classes prefixed with "Capptain" are renamed with "Engagement" prefix.

trans-unit.source: Examples:
trans-unit.target: Examples:

trans-unit.source: The class CapptainAgent is renamed to EngagementAgent.
trans-unit.target: The class CapptainAgent is renamed to EngagementAgent.

trans-unit.source: The class CapptainTableViewController is renamed to EngagementTableViewController.
trans-unit.target: The class CapptainTableViewController is renamed to EngagementTableViewController.

trans-unit.source: The class CapptainUtils is renamed to EngagementUtils.
trans-unit.target: The class CapptainUtils is renamed to EngagementUtils.

trans-unit.source: The class CapptainViewController is renamed to EngagementViewController.
trans-unit.target: The class CapptainViewController is renamed to EngagementViewController.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
